verbs.description: slow - cooker pot roast [ARG0: i] [V: work] [ARGM-TMP: full time] so this pot roast from a slow cooker is my go - to when i want a hearty home cooked meal it a comfort to walk in and smell this simmering slow cooked pot roast that i know will be fall - apart tender and delicious —gina jackson ogdensburg new york cook
